text: Zisas mba bunin mba Zon Gumgi Ruai Guma phorga rui gumani ga suaŋgim, mani vui. Mani taagia vugim, Zisas mbaram Zon Gumgi Ruai Guma ga nzuav mba gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve ga nzuai. Ana khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde mba gumgi ki fhuv ŋanen vegi. Nde thagɨna ganɨ zav wari vegi? Ee, nde vuruna the garim, bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ ana rɨgim, ana nɨɨŋkuim, nde ana ganɨ zav vegire? Fhuvara.
